alert.title: Alert
alert.description: Display warning messages that require attention.
alert.basic_desc: The simplest usage for short messages.
alert.closable_desc: Display close button to dismiss the alert.
alert.icon_desc: A relevant icon makes the information clearer.
alert.with_description_desc: Additional description for the alert message.
alert.banner_desc: Full-width display without border, suitable for page-level notifications.

demo.success_description: Detailed description and advice about successful copywriting.
demo.info_description: Additional description and information about copywriting.
demo.banner_warning: Warning: This is a banner warning message
demo.banner_error: Error: This is a banner error message

action.error_desc: This is a very long error description text used to test the layout behavior of the action button when text wraps, ensuring content wraps correctly.
action.info_desc: This is a very long info description text used to test the display of multiple buttons in a complex layout, ensuring visual coordination.

alert.action_desc: Additional action to support user interaction.

alert.title: Alert title
alert.token_desc: Below are the design tokens for the Alert component.

alert.colorError: Token sequence for operation failure, such as failed buttons, error status prompts (Result) components, etc.
alert.colorErrorBg: Light background color of error color
alert.colorIcon: Control the color of weak action icons, such as allowClear or Alert close button.
alert.colorIconHover: Control the color of weak action icons in hover state, such as allowClear or Alert close button.
alert.colorInfo: Token sequence for operation information, such as Alert, Tag, Progress and other components.
alert.colorInfoBg: Light background color of info color.
alert.colorSuccess: Token sequence for operation success, such as Result, Progress and other components.
alert.colorSuccessBg: Light background color of success color, used for Tag and Alert success background.
alert.colorSuccessBorder: Border color of success color, used for Tag and Alert success border.
alert.colorText: The deepest text color. To comply with W3C standards, the default text color uses this color.
alert.colorWarning: Token sequence for operation warning, such as Notification, Alert and other warning components.
alert.colorWarningBg: Light background color of warning color
alert.borderRadiusLG: LG border radius, used for large border radius in components like Card, Modal, etc.
alert.fontSize: The most widely used font size in the design system.
alert.fontSizeIcon: Font size for action icons in selectors, cascaders, etc. Normally same as fontSizeSM.
alert.lineWidth: Width for component borders, dividers, etc.
